infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Paw's Life needs access to your photo library so you can choose a photo for your pet’s profile. The selected photo stays on your device and is only visible to you.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Paw's Life needs access to your camera so you can take a photo to use in your pet’s profile or ask Paw’s Life AI about your pet. Photos stay on your device unless you choose to share them.

plugins.photosPermission: Paw's Life needs access to your photo library so you can choose a photo for your pet’s profile. The selected photo stays on your device and is only visible to you.
plugins.cameraPermission: Paw's Life needs access to your camera so you can take a photo to use in your pet’s profile or ask Paw’s Life AI about your pet. Photos stay on your device unless you choose to share them.
